trans-unit.source: Represents an object that specifies the layout of a row of data.
trans-unit.target: 代表指定資料列版面配置的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter> classes support the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter>類別支援<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>檢視模式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> to style rows in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter>樣式中的資料列<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The area to use to display the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" />.
trans-unit.target: 要用來顯示 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" /> 的區域。

trans-unit.source: Positions the content of a row according to the size of the corresponding <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 根據對應之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> 物件的大小來放置資料列內容。

trans-unit.source: The actual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> that is used to display the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" />.
trans-unit.target: 用來顯示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> 的實際 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data content to display in a row.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在資料列中顯示的資料內容。

trans-unit.source: The object that represents the content of a row.
trans-unit.target: 表示資料列內容的物件。

trans-unit.source: The typical usage of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] is to place it in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a control.
trans-unit.target: 通常的使用方式的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter>中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]是將它放在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The template binds the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A> property to a property of the control by using [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md).
trans-unit.target: 範本會繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A>屬性來使用控制項的屬性[TemplateBinding 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何將繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter>至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A> 相依性屬性的識別項。

trans-unit.source: [Dependency Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview.md)
trans-unit.target: [相依性屬性概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview.md)

trans-unit.source: The maximum area to use to display the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" />.
trans-unit.target: 用來顯示 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" /> 的最大區域。

trans-unit.source: Determines the area that is required to display the row.
trans-unit.target: 決定顯示資料列所需的區域。

trans-unit.source: The actual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> of the area that displays the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" />.
trans-unit.target: 顯示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> 之區域的實際 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" /> 的字串表示法。

trans-unit.source: A string that shows the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" />.
trans-unit.target: 顯示 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content" /> 的字串。
